Document.title: Document
Document.description: Represents a document uploaded to the system, such as a PDF course description, lab manual, or past paper.

filename.description: The original filename of the uploaded document.

uploadDate.description: The date and time when the document was uploaded.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the uploaded document (e.g., 'application/pdf').

storageLocation.description: The location where the document is stored (e.g., a file path or cloud storage URL).  This assumes the file is available on the backend.

title.description: The title of the document as extracted from the file metadata or content.

description.description: A user-provided description of the document's content and purpose.

content.description: The extracted text content of the document.

'/documents/{documentId}'.description: Stores all uploaded documents. No explicit ownership as documents are managed by the backend.
